item.description:
Welcome to the Providence Collective Monday Meetup series!

This event is open to all, especially those who hate Mondays and especially for those who want to check out the different restaurant and event scenes in Providence.

This week's location is: E&O Tap - on Knight Street (near the Avery) over on the West Side!

E&O Tap is a FAVORITE with P-Collective Members! It's a little tough to find, but well worth it. Once you go, you will definitely be back!

Located in a neighborhood setting, its a small, one-story brick building that looks a little benign. Look for the cool sign over the doorway and the big, lit up E and O on the windows. Considered "a bit divey, but in a cool, hipster kinda way" and a great place to end a night on the West Side, its located in same area as the Avery. (you're almost an RI'er if you know where that is - I couldn't resist - LOL!). With your back to the Avery, go down the street to the end (Knight Street) and look left - there it is!

Be forewarned, they don't serve food, but the bartender has a plethora of menus to pick from for delivery - so its kind of the best of both worlds. Its been way TOO long since we've been back for an MNM! So, by Val's suggestion and popular demand, come over to E&O for some fun and good cheer this Monday night, and let's check it out! You'll be glad you did!

Hope to see you there!

Come early, come late, leave early, stay late, everyone is always welcome...

Nothing ever cancels Monday Happy Hours. Ever.
item.how_to_find_us: Val is hosting this one!!! It's not that big - you can't miss us!!!
item.name: Monday Night Meetup - E&O Tap!
